main.name: Clever Eziogor
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe Code
main.bio: Hi there! I am Clever! Talented Software Engineer adept at working with customers, team members and project leaders to accomplish software engineering and updating tasks according to timelines. Solid understanding of full software development lifecycle. Skilled working with wide range of front- and back-end technologies to produce and evaluate code. Proud team player focused on achieving project objectives with speed and accuracy..

education.school: Federal University Of Petroleum Resources Effurun
education.description: Graduated with second Class upper Honours

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: A member of the frontend  team developing web solutions for TeckLink.. Built reusable react components and styled with Bootstrap and materialUI.. Managed state and HTTP requests with Redux.. Exposure to Agile methodologies.. Exposure to working in remote conditions.. Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.. Cooperate with web designers to match visual design intent Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: A member of a  team that developed an Agro-ecommerce platform.. Built projects with Nodejs, React.js, typescript, GraphQL, and Javascript.. Handled Database Management System with SQL like MySQL, Postgres, or NoSQL databases like MongoDB.. Experience writing unit and integration test using Jest, SuperTest, cypress etc.. Performed software testing to uncover bugs and troubleshoot issues prior to application launch.. I Integrated work tools such as slack/Github, slack, Jira which forms the main part of our agile process.. Introduced agile methodologies and effective development best practices to division to enhance product development.

projects.title: Agro ecommerce (NodeJs, MongoDB, Typescript, CSS, HTML, CI/CD)

testimonials.text: Clever is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his ability to communucate really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning Coding so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
